summary: Saudi Aramco is a huge oil and gas company owned mostly by the Saudi Arabian government. It's one of the biggest companies globally and is based in Dhahran. The company has massive oil reserves, over 270 billion barrels, and produces more oil daily than any other company. It operates a vast network of oil and gas fields, including the world's largest onshore and offshore oil fields in the Eastern Province. In 2019, Saudi Aramco started trading on the stock market and became the world's most valuable company, worth over $1.8 trillion.
title: Saudi Aramco
